It was higher in their second study but that one had "greater emphasis on patient training"
item.description:
@neuralengine That's what I thought initially, but even the placebo effect was weak in their first study, only 26% of men said the placebo "improved their erectile function".
It was higher in their second study but that one had "greater emphasis on patient training"
item.content:encoded: @neuralengine That's what I thought initially, but even the placebo effect was weak in their first study, only 26% of men said the placebo "improved their erectile function". It was higher in their second study but that one had "greater emphasis on patient training"

item.title:
This month, we highlight the legacy of Ben A. Barres. As a trans neurobiologist, known for his discovery of the role of glial cells in the brain, he broke several barriers in the scientific world and served as a fervent advocate for gender equity.
#PrideMonth #Pride2023
